channel.title: Atri Hegde
channel.description: A simple blog theme focused on writing powered by Bulma and Zola

item.title: First Post
item.description:
I finally got around to writing a static page website using zola. I can now save snippets of insight on here to refer back later or just have tips and tricks that will be of help to other people. Right now I'm learning the rust ðŸ¦€ programming language and working on my arch install and arch config scripts.

Some of the things I plan to do over summer:

  • start a hobby youtube channel.
  • learn emacs or vim.
  • optimize my workflow.
  • learn to write pdfs using LaTeX.
  • increase typing speed.
  • potentially add a comments section to posts.
